get.description: Get list of active devices/sessions for a user

delete.description: Reset/logout all devices for a user
Reset/logout a specific device for a user

get.description: Get list of users with pagination, search, and filters

post.description: Create a new user (internal or mitra)

get.description: Get list of mitra companies for dropdown
Get list of roles for dropdown

put.description: Update user data (email cannot be changed)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token
Logout user and invalidate permission cache

get.description: Get hierarchical menu structure for authenticated user based on their role permissions

post.description: Generate a new access token using a valid refresh token
Register a new user with email, password, and role

forced_logout_device.description: Only present if auto force logout occurred

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
